text: Roxbury is an unincorporated community located off the Blue Mountain exit of the Pennsylvania Turnpike (Interstate 76) in Lurgan Township, Franklin County, Pennsylvania. Route 641 and Route 997 meet there. Roxbury was laid out about 1778. A post office called Roxbury has been in operation since 1822. ==Notable people== • Carl Cover (1893-1944) aviation pioneer ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Franklin County, Pennsylvania Category:Unincorporated communities in Pennsylvania
title: Roxbury, Pennsylvania
